mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_ID AS boardId, b.TITLE AS title, b.CATEGORY AS category, b.WRITE_DATE AS writeDate, b.THUMBNAIL AS thumbnail, b.WRITER_IDX AS writerIdx, b.VIEW_COUNT AS viewCount, m.NICKNAME AS writerName, l.LIKE_DATE AS likeDate FROM BOARD_LIKE l INNER JOIN BOARD b ON l.BOARD_ID = b.BOARD_ID INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON b.WRITER_IDX = m.MEMBER_IDX WHERE l.MEMBER_IDX = #{memberIdx} ORDER BY l.LIKE_DATE DESC

SELECT b.BOARD_ID AS boardId, b.TITLE AS title, b.CATEGORY AS category, b.WRITE_DATE AS writeDate, b.THUMBNAIL AS thumbnail, b.VIEW_COUNT AS viewCount FROM BOARD b WHERE b.WRITER_IDX = #{memberIdx} ORDER BY b.WRITE_DATE DESC
